earth.name: Earth
earth.description: The elemental magic of earth focuses on the manipulation of stone, metal, and the physical properties of the ground.

air.name: Air
air.description: The elemental magic of air focuses on the manipulation of wind, sound, and the properties of the atmosphere.

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: The elemental magic of fire focuses on the manipulation of heat, combustion, and energy.

water.name: Water
water.description: The elemental magic of water focuses on the manipulation of liquids, ice, and the properties of water.

aether.name: Aether
aether.description: The elemental magic of aether focuses on the manipulation of ephemeral energies, enchantments, and magical essences.

light.name: Light
light.description: The elemental magic of light focuses on the manipulation of healing energies, holy power, and radiant energy. Often perceived as 'holy' or 'good'

dark.name: Dark
dark.description: The elemental magic of dark focuses on the manipulation of unholy energies, corruption, and shadow. Often perceived as 'unholy' or 'evil'
dark.regulation: Necromancy and demon summoning are highly regulated or illegal in most areas.

spirit.name: Spirit
spirit.description: The elemental magic of spirit focuses on the manipulation of life forces, souls, and the ethereal.
spirit.regulation: Binding of humanoid spirits considered equivalent to undead creation and is regulated or illegal in many areas.

mind.name: Mind
mind.description: The elemental magic of mind focuses on the manipulation of thoughts, emotions, and consciousness. Direct removal of agency viewed as moral violation.
mind.regulation: Mind Control and Memory Manipulation heavily regulated or illegal in many areas

time.name: Time
time.description: The elemental magic of time focuses on the manipulation of temporal energies, time travel, and the flow of time.
time.regulation: Extremely dangerous with catastrophic potential, thus most time magic heavily regulated with severe penalties

bolt_earth.name: Bolt of Earth
bolt_earth.description: Launches a shard of rock or metal at high speed towards a target, dealing physical damage.

shield_earth.name: Earth Shield
shield_earth.description: Creates a protective barrier of earth or stone around the caster and potentially others, absorbing damage. This barrier can be resized to include others based on the caster's power level. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: Allows the caster to tunnel through earth and stone.

weapon_earth.name: Blade of Earth
weapon_earth.description: Forms a weapon made of stone or metal, such as a sword, hammer, or spear, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

entangle.name: Entangle
entangle.description: Causes plants or roots to grow rapidly, slowing or immobilizing a target.

wall_of_stone.name: Wall of Stone
wall_of_stone.description: Creates a solid wall of stone that can be used for defense or to block passage.

armor_earth.name: Earth Armor
armor_earth.description: Encases the caster in a suit of magical energy armor, reducing physical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

elemental_earth.name: Elemental Summon: Earth
elemental_earth.description: Summons an earth elemental to assist the caster in combat or other tasks. The elemental will have a creature rating equivalent to the caster's power level.

entomb.name: Entomb
entomb.description: Encases a target in solid earth or stone, immobilizing them.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Causes the ground to shake violently, knocking down and disorienting creatures in the area.

gravity_well.name: Gravity Well
gravity_well.description: Creates a localized black hole, sucking in objects and creatures. The area and strength of the effect increase with the caster's power level.

bolt_aether.name: Aether Bolt
bolt_aether.description: Launches a bolt of pure magical energy at a target, dealing arcane damage.

shield_aether.name: Aether Shield
shield_aether.description: Creates a protective barrier of magical energy around the caster and potentially others, absorbing damage. This barrier can be resized to include others based on the caster's power level. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up.

wisplight.name: Wisp Light
wisplight.description: Creates a floating pale-white light source about the intensity of a torch, useful for illuminating dark areas.

weapon_aether.name: Blade of Aether
weapon_aether.description: Forms a weapon made of pure magical energy, such as a sword, hammer, or spear, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

armor_aether.name: Aether Armor
armor_aether.description: Encases the caster in a suit of magical energy armor, reducing magical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.description: Allows the caster to move objects with magic.

imbue_broom.name: Imbue Broom
imbue_broom.description: Enchants a broom or similar object to allow it to fly for a limited time.

dispel.name: Dispel
dispel.description: Removes magical effects from a target or area. Can cancel magical effects up to a level equal to the caster's skill level.

item_box.name: Item Box
item_box.description: Creates a small extradimensional space for storing items. The box can hold a limited amount of weight and volume based on the caster's skill level.

enchant_item.name: Enchant Item
enchant_item.description: Imbues an item with magical properties or enhancements.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Allows the caster to instantly transport themselves or others to a known location.

dimensional_pocket.name: Dimensional Pocket
dimensional_pocket.description: Creates an extradimensional space whose size is based on the caster's power level. Truly powerful casters have been known to create vast pockets of space or their own demi-planes. Though this generally requires a ritual. Casters may only have one pocket active at a time but the pocket remains in existence between uses. Whether the pocket collapses or is just inaccessible when the caster dies is unknown.

bolt_air.name: Air Bolt
bolt_air.description: Launches a bolt of compressed air or lightning at a target, dealing damage through blunt force or electrical shock.

shield_air.name: Shield of Wind
shield_air.description: Creates a protective barrier of swirling winds around the caster. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up.

shock.name: Shock
shock.description: Delivers a jolt of electricity to a target, causing electrical damage and potentially stunning them.

weapon_air.name: Wind Blade
weapon_air.description: Forms a weapon made of concentrated air or lightning, such as a sword, spear, or whip, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: Allows the caster to levitate or fly for a short duration.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: Creates a powerful blast of wind that can knock back enemies or objects.

invisible_servant.name: Invisible Servant
invisible_servant.description: Creates an invisible, very limited form of air elemental that can perform simple tasks for the caster. The servant will dissipate after a short time or if it takes any damage.

silence.name: Silence
silence.description: Dampens sound in a small area, making it impossible to hear anything within or from outside the area. This can be a double-edged sword as it also prevents the caster from hearing what is happening outside the area.

armor_air.name: Wind Armor
armor_air.description: Encases the caster in a suit of wind energy armor, reducing physical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

elemental_air.name: Elemental Summon: Air
elemental_air.description: Summons an air elemental to assist the caster in combat or other tasks. The elemental will have a creature rating equivalent to the caster's power level.

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: A stronger variation of the common bolt spell, dealing significant damage and potentially stunning the target, may arc to nearby targets.

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.description: Renders the caster or a target invisible for a short duration.

bolt_fire.name: Fire Bolt
bolt_fire.description: Launches a bolt of fire at a target, causing burn damage over time.

shield_fire.name: Flame Shield
shield_fire.description: Creates a protective barrier of flames around the caster. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up.

ignite.name: Ignite
ignite.description: Sets a target ablaze, causing ongoing fire damage.

weapon_fire.name: Flaming Sword
weapon_fire.description: Forms a weapon engulfed in flames, such as a sword, axe, or spear, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

desicate.name: Desicate
desicate.description: Dries out moisture from a target, causing dehydration and weakening them.

armor_fire.name: Fire Armor
armor_fire.description: Encases the caster in a suit of fire energy armor, reducing physical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

elemental_fire.name: Elemental Summon: Fire
elemental_fire.description: Summons a fire elemental to assist the caster in combat or other tasks. The elemental will have a creature rating equivalent to the caster's power level.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: A higher powered version of the bolt of fire spell dealing damage in a roughly 5 meter spherical area.

wall_of_fire.name: Wall of Fire
wall_of_fire.description: Creates a wall of intense flames that damages anyone who passes through it.

combustion.name: Combustion
combustion.description: Causes a single significantly weaker target to explode in a burst of flames, dealing damage to nearby creatures from bone fragment shrapnel. Terrifying to witness and can cause panic.

meteor_shower.name: Meteor Shower
meteor_shower.description: Calls down a rain of fiery meteors that strike multiple targets in an area.

bolt_water.name: Water Bolt
bolt_water.description: Launches a bolt of water or ice at a target, causing damage through blunt force or freezing.

shield_water.name: Water Shield
shield_water.description: Creates a protective barrier of water or ice around the caster. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up.

mend.name: Mend
mend.description: A first aid spell that repairs minor wounds, injuries and stops bleeding on a target. Useful for those without access to Light magic, but significantly less effective than true healing spells.

water_breathing.name: Water Breathing
water_breathing.description: Allows the caster or a target to breathe underwater for a limited time.

weapon_water.name: Ice Blade
weapon_water.description: Forms a weapon made of solid ice or water, such as a sword, spear, or whip, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

drown.name: Drown
drown.description: Creates a bubble of water around a target, making it difficult for them to breathe.

wellspring.name: Wellspring
wellspring.description: Creates a source of fresh water in a dry area.

armor_water.name: Ice Armor
armor_water.description: Encases the caster in a suit of ice energy armor, reducing physical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

elemental_water.name: Elemental Summon: Water
elemental_water.description: Summons a water elemental to assist the caster in combat or other tasks. The elemental will have a creature rating equivalent to the caster's power level.

freeze.name: Freeze
freeze.description: Encases a target in ice, immobilizing them temporarily.

torrential_rain.name: Torrential Rain
torrential_rain.description: Summons a storm that brings heavy rain and strong winds to an area.

tidal_wave.name: Tidal Wave
tidal_wave.description: Summons a large wave of water that crashes down on an area, knocking back and damaging creatures. Requires a significant amount of water to be present.

bolt_light.name: Light Bolt
bolt_light.description: Launches a bolt of radiant light at a target, causing damage through searing light and holy energy.

shield_light.name: Radiant Shield
shield_light.description: Creates a protective shimmering field of radiant energy around the caster. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up. Attacks though a radiant shield are weakened, reducing their effectiveness. Susceptible to dark and shadowy attacks.

cure.name: Cure
cure.description: Removes poisons, diseases, and other ailments from the target. Actual rank in light magic needed is equal to the rank of the poison or disease.

light.name: Light
light.description: Creates a very bright floating light source, useful for illuminating dark areas. Casts a strong light of any color in about a 10 foot area.

weapon_light.name: Blade of Light
weapon_light.description: Forms a weapon made of pure radiant light, such as a sword, hammer, or spear, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

purify.name: Purify
purify.description: Cleanses food, water, or an area of toxins and contaminants.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Restores a health to a target. The amount healed is based on the caster's power level.

armor_light.name: Light Armor
armor_light.description: Encases the caster in a suit of radiant energy armor, reducing physical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Grants a target increased resilience and luck, improving their chances of success in various tasks.

holy_fire.name: Holy Fire
holy_fire.description: Calls down a pillar of divine fire that damages undead and demonic creatures.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Empowers the caster's weapon with divine energy, dealing extra damage to undead and demons.

holy_bonds.name: Holy Bonds
holy_bonds.description: Restrains a target with chains of divine energy, preventing movement and actions.

summon_archon.name: Summon Archon
summon_archon.description: Calls forth a powerful celestial being to aid the caster in battle. Considered an act of hubris by many religious orders.

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Creates a protective area where hostile actions are prohibited.

banish.name: Banish
banish.description: Attempts to sends a summoned or extraplanar creature back to its home plane. Success depends on a contest of wills between the caster and the target.

restoration.name: Restoration
restoration.description: Restores lost or non-functional limbs or body parts.

ascendancy.name: Ascendancy
ascendancy.description: The process of transforming a human into a celestial being, gaining immortality and divine powers. Generally only granted by powerful celestial entities to those who have proven themselves worthy.

bolt_dark.name: Dark Bolt
bolt_dark.description: Launches a bolt of shadowy energy at a target, causing damage through necrotic energy and corruption.

shield_dark.name: Shadow Shield
shield_dark.description: Creates a protective shimmering field of shadow energy around the caster. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up. Attacks though a shadow shield are strengthened, increasing their effectiveness. Susceptible to light-based attacks.

weapon_dark.name: Blade of Shadows
weapon_dark.description: Forms a weapon made of pure shadow energy, such as a sword, hammer, or spear, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand.

shadow_step.name: Shadow Step
shadow_step.description: Allows the caster to quickly teleport short distances (line of sight) through shadows.

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description: Creates an area of magical darkness, obscuring vision.

drain_life.name: Drain Life
drain_life.description: Saps life force from a target, healing the caster.

putrefy.name: Putrefy
putrefy.description: Causes non-living organic material to decay rapidly, damaging living targets or degrading objects.

shadow_servant.name: Shadow Servant
shadow_servant.description: Creates shadowy, human forms that can follow simple commands to perform light tasks and distract enemies. Will dissipate if attacked or after a short time.

black_tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
black_tentacles.description: Summons writhing shadowy tentacles that can grapple and restrain targets within an area. The number and strength of the tentacles scale with the caster's rank.

sicken.name: Sicken
sicken.description: Inflicts a target with nausea and weakness, impairing their ability to fight.

bane.name: Bane
bane.description: Empowers the caster's weapon with unholy energy, dealing extra damage to living creatures or those with a connection to the light.

armor_dark.name: Shadow Armor
armor_dark.description: Encases the caster in a suit of shadow energy armor, reducing physical attacks by two ranks. The armor will adapt to the caster's movements and can be reshaped or removed at will. Will dissipate if forcibly removed. A character may only wear one suit of armor at a time.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: Inflicts a target with bad luck or misfortune, hindering their actions.

animate_dead.name: Animate Dead
animate_dead.description: Summons an undead servant(s) under the caster's control. The strength and number of undead is based on the caster's power level.

summon_shadow.name: Summon Shadow
summon_shadow.description: Summons a shadow elemental to aid the caster; the power of the elemental is based on the caster's power.

summon_demon.name: Summon Demon
summon_demon.description: Summons and restrains a demon, allowing the caster to negotiate a contract. If a contract is not made within 666 minutes, the demon will be returned to its realm.

lichdom.name: Lichdom
lichdom.description: The process of transforming oneself into a lich, an undead spellcaster who has achieved immortality through dark magic. The process is long and requires the sacrifice of at least 666 innocent souls. Making it an inherently evil act.

ascendancy.name: Ascendancy
ascendancy.description: The process of transforming a human into a celestial being, gaining immortality and divine powers. Generally only granted by powerful celestial entities to those who have proven themselves worthy.

bolt_spirit.name: Spirit Bolt
bolt_spirit.description: Launches a bolt of spiritual energy at a target, causing no physical damage but affecting the target's spirit.

spirit_shield.name: Spirit Shield
spirit_shield.description: Creates a protective barrier that wards against spiritual and magical attacks.

spirit_walk.name: Spirit Walk
spirit_walk.description: Allows the caster to temporarily leave their physical body and explore the spirit realm.

weapon_spirit.name: Blade of Spirits
weapon_spirit.description: Forms a weapon made of pure spiritual energy, such as a sword, hammer, or spear, which the caster can wield in combat. Will dissipate at will or if it leaves the caster's hand. This blade does no physical damage, dealing damage directly to the target's spirit.

animal_companion.name: Animal Companion
animal_companion.description: Summons a loyal animal companion to aid the caster. The animal's strength and abilities scale with the caster's power level. A caster may have 1 animal companion per rank.

call_animal.name: Call Animal
call_animal.description: Summons a wild animal to the caster's location for assistance. The animal is not bound but is friendly to the caster and may leave after a short time.

spirit_bind.name: Spirit Bind
spirit_bind.description: Binds a willing animal spirit to an object or location, allowing it to serve the caster. Binding sapient spirits (djinn, human souls, etc.) requires specialist knowledge and is heavily regulated due to ethical concerns.

totem.name: Totem
totem.description: Creates a magical totem that provides various benefits to the caster and their allies. This totem remains in existence until destroyed or dispelled. A limited form of enchantment item.

spirit_ward.name: Spirit Ward
spirit_ward.description: Creates a protective symbol that repels spirits and magical entities.

exorcism.name: Exorcism
exorcism.description: Casts out sprits or entities from a person or location.

bolt_mind.name: Mind Bolt
bolt_mind.description: Launches a bolt of psychic energy at a target, causing mental damage and disorientation.

shield_mind.name: Psychic Shield
shield_mind.description: Creates a protective barrier of psychic energy around the caster. Effective against mental attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up.

link_mind.name: Mind Link
link_mind.description: Establishes a telepathic connection between the caster and another individual.

phantom_veil.name: Phantom Veil
phantom_veil.description: Creates an illusionary disguise that alters the caster's appearance and voice.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: Instills a deep sense of fear in the target or targets, causing them to flee or become paralyzed with terror.

charm.name: Charm
charm.description: Makes the caster seem more appealing or trustworthy to the target. Frequently used in social situations to influence a target's behavior without their knowledge.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Creates a rune that protects against psychic intrusion, scrying, or clairvoyance.

read_thoughts.name: Read Thoughts
read_thoughts.description: Allows the caster to hear the surface thoughts of a target. Finding deeper thoughts requires greater concentration and a contest of wills with the target.

alter_memory.name: Memory Alteration
alter_memory.description: Modifies or erases specific memories from a target's mind.

control_mind.name: Mind Control
control_mind.description: Takes complete control of a target's actions and decisions.

bolt_time.name: Time Bolt
bolt_time.description: Launches a bolt of temporal energy at a target, causing damage through rapid aging and decay in a localized area.

shield_time.name: Temporal Shield
shield_time.description: Creates a protective shimmering field of temporal energy around the caster. Effective against magic and physical attacks. Will reduce attacks by the casters skill rank, but is tiring to keep up. Attacks though a temporal shield are slowed in time, reducing their effectiveness. Susceptible to slow methodical attacks (The slow blade penetrates the shield)

hasten.name: Hasten
hasten.description: Accelerates the flow of time for the caster or a target, increasing their speed and reflexes for a short duration. Effect scales with the caster's rank.

age.name: Age
age.description: Accelerates or decelerates the aging process of a target.

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.description: Reverses time for a short duration, undoing recent events or actions.

reverse_aging.name: Reverse Aging
reverse_aging.description: Restores youth to a target by reversing their aging process. This spell requires a significant sacrifice, often in the form of life energy or a powerful magical artifact.

time_stop.name: Time Stop
time_stop.description: Temporarily halts the flow of time for a brief period, allowing the caster to act without interference.

temporal_anchor.name: Temporal Anchor
temporal_anchor.description: Creates a fixed point in time that the caster can return to later. Useful for escape and strategic planning. A caster may have only one active anchor at a time. Skilled mages can set this to trigger in the event of their death.
